## timeoutPromise() function

Raise an error if a promise does not finish within a certain timeframe. Note this does not cancel the promise itself (because that's impossible).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function timeoutPromise<T>(config: Config, promise: Promise<T>, { timeout, message, warning }?: TimeoutPromiseOptions): Promise<T | undefined>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  config | Config | The pentf configuration. |
|  promise | Promise&lt;T&gt; | The promise to limit |
|  { timeout, message, warning } | [TimeoutPromiseOptions](./pentf.timeoutpromiseoptions.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;T \| undefined&gt;

{<!-- -->\*<!-- -->} Whatever the promise returned, if it is successful
